aboutus-section.label: About Us
aboutus-section.title: Peduli Ilmu Foundation of Central Sulawesi

description.desc-1:
The Central Sulawesi Care Foundation was founded with a noble vision to develop quality Islamic education in the Central Sulawesi region. 
We are committed to producing a generation that is not only intellectually intelligent, but also has noble character.
description.desc-2:
Since its establishment, this foundation has carried out various education and da'wah programs that have a positive impact on the community. 
With the support of donors and volunteers who care, we continue to make the best contribution to the progress of Islamic education in Indonesia.
description.desc-3: Our programs are designed to meet the needs of comprehensive Islamic education, ranging from formal education in Islamic boarding schools to community learning programs that are open to the general public.

visimisi-section.title: Vision
visimisi-section.visi: Being an superior Islamic educational institution in printing a generation of knowledgeable, noble character, and able to contribute positively to the progress of the people and nation.

about-section.label: About the community
about-section.title: Ta’shilul ‘ilmi palu community
about-section.description:
The Ta’shil Ilmi Palu community is a community formed to accommodate learning related to the foundations of Shariah Sciences by studying the books of the ulama in a structured manner. 
This community is open to the brothers, anyone who wants to learn the foundations of syar'i science.

visi.title: Vision
visi.desc: Print a prosecutor who mastered the basis of religious knowledge

misions.misi-2: Emphasis on memorization of the Quran, Hadith and Matan-Question of Science
misions.misi-3: Emphasis on the branch of Arabic language
misions.misi-1: Review and teach the books of Salaf scholars

rule-section.title: Rules
rules: Commit to the program sincerely for the sake of Allah and be earnest (serious)
This program is only for brothers who are serious and committed to the learning process. Attendance is MANDATORY
Bring a notebook and pen for taking notes
Maintain proper manners during study sessions
Maintain good relationships with teachers, fellow students, and organizers
Follow venue rules, and keep order and cleanliness during the program

note.title: Important Note
note.body: If you're unable to commit seriously, you may still join the study sessions but only with the status of mustafid (beneficiary).
